sets.description: Increase ATK by **2.1%/2.6%/3.1%/3.6%** on hit for **18** seconds, stacking up to **5** times. Only the effect of the highest level is applied when obtained repeatedly.

Every 5m traveled within Moonlight Realm grants **1** stack of Moonlight, increasing final damage by **4%/4.9%/5.8%/6.7%** for **15** seconds, stacking up to **3** times. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
